mapper.select:
select * from T_JW_COURSE t where t.course_name=#{courseName}
AND course_id != #{courseId}

SELECT DISTINCT t1.COURSE_ID, t1.COURSE_NAME, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.COURSE_TYPE, 'KCLX') COURSE_TYPE, t1.create_time createTime, t1.course_code courseCode, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.COURSE_PROPERTIES,'KCJSSX') courseProperties, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.SCHOOL_ENTERPRISE_COOPERATION,'KCSF') schoolEnterpriseCooperation, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.CORE_CURRICULUM,'KCSF') coreCurriculum, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.EXCELLENT_COURSE,'KCJPKC') excellentCourse, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.VENUE,'KCSKDD') venue, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.TEST_METHOD,'KCKSKHFF') testMethod, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.CLASS_CERTIFIATE,'KCSF') classCertifiate, t1.PRESCRIBED_PERIODS prescribedPeriods, t1.PRACTICE_CLASS, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t1.TEACHING_METHOD,'ZYSKFS') teachingMethod
,FUNC_GET_DEPTNAME(t1.DEPARTMENTS_ID) DEPARTMENTS_ID, t2.MAJOR_NAME || ' -- ' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t2.TRAINING_LEVEL,'ZXZYPYCC') MAJOR_ID
FROM T_JW_COURSE t1
,T_XG_MAJOR t2
WHERE 1=1
AND t1.COURSE_NAME LIKE '%${courseName}%'
AND t1.DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{departmentsId}
AND t1.MAJOR_CODE = #{majorCode}
AND t1.TRAINING_LEVEL = #{trainingLevel}
AND t1.COURSE_TYPE = 1
AND t1.COURSE_TYPE != 1 AND t1.MAJOR_CODE = t2.MAJOR_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_JW_COURSE (COURSE_ID, COURSE_NAME, COURSE_TYPE, DEPARTMENTS_ID,MAJOR_CODE,TRAINING_LEVEL,course_code, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_DEPT, CHANGER, CHANGE_TIME, CHANGE_DEPT, COURSE_PROPERTIES,PRESCRIBED_PERIODS,PRACTICE_CLASS,CORE_CURRICULUM,SCHOOL_ENTERPRISE_COOPERATION, EXCELLENT_COURSE,VENUE,TEACHING_METHOD,TEST_METHOD,CLASS_CERTIFIATE) VALUES (FUNC_GET_UUID,#{courseName},#{courseType},#{departmentsId},#{majorCode},#{trainingLevel},#{courseCode},#{creator},#{createTime},#{createDept},#{changer},#{changeTime},#{changeDept}, #{courseProperties},#{prescribedPeriods},#{practiceClass},#{coreCurriculum},#{schoolEnterpriseCooperation}, #{excellentCourse},#{venue},#{teachingMethod},#{testMethod},#{classCertifiate})
mapper.select: SELECT COURSE_ID courseId, COURSE_NAME courseName, COURSE_TYPE courseType, DEPARTMENTS_ID departmentsId, course_code courseCode, MAJOR_CODE || ',' || TRAINING_LEVEL majorCode, COURSE_PROPERTIES, PRESCRIBED_PERIODS, PRACTICE_CLASS, CORE_CURRICULUM, SCHOOL_ENTERPRISE_COOPERATION, EXCELLENT_COURSE, VENUE, TEACHING_METHOD, TEST_METHOD, CLASS_CERTIFIATE, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(TRAINING_LEVEL,'ZXZYPYCC') trainingLevel FROM T_JW_COURSE WHERE COURSE_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_JW_COURSE SET COURSE_NAME = #{courseName}, COURSE_TYPE = #{courseType}, DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{departmentsId}, MAJOR_CODE = #{majorCode},TRAINING_LEVEL = #{trainingLevel}, CHANGER = #{changer}, CHANGE_TIME = #{changeTime}, CHANGE_DEPT = #{changeDept}, COURSE_PROPERTIES = #{courseProperties}, PRESCRIBED_PERIODS = #{prescribedPeriods}, PRACTICE_CLASS = #{practiceClass}, CORE_CURRICULUM = #{coreCurriculum}, SCHOOL_ENTERPRISE_COOPERATION = #{schoolEnterpriseCooperation}, EXCELLENT_COURSE = #{excellentCourse}, VENUE = #{venue}, TEACHING_METHOD = #{teachingMethod}, TEST_METHOD = #{testMethod}, CLASS_CERTIFIATE = #{classCertifiate} WHERE COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MAJOR_CODE || ',' || TRAINING_LEVEL id, MAJOR_NAME || ' -- ' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(TRAINING_LEVEL, 'ZXZYPYCC') text FROM T_XG_MAJOR WHERE DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = 1
SELECT DISTINCT MAJOR_ID id, MAJOR_NAME || ' -- ' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(TRAINING_LEVEL, 'ZXZYPYCC') text FROM T_XG_MAJOR WHERE DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = 1

SELECT DEPT_ID "id", DEPT_NAME "text" FROM T_SYS_DEPT
WHERE DEPT_TYPE = #{type}
select DISTINCT t.major_code from T_XG_MAJOR t where t.major_name like '%'||#{majorName}||'%' AND VALID_FLAG = 1
SELECT DISTINCT MAJOR_NAME FROM T_XG_MAJOR WHERE DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = 1
SELECT major_code "id", major_name "text" FROM T_XG_MAJOR where VALID_FLAG = 1
